sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: The title of this block. **Must be unique for this page.**

sub_fields.label: Minimum height
sub_fields.name: height
sub_fields.instructions: Minimum block height, relative to window.

sub_fields.label: Next arrow text
sub_fields.name: next_arrow_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text displayed in the "next arrow" leading to this block. Leave blank to use block title.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: The background image. Should be at least 1000px wide.
sub_fields.mime_types: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF

sub_fields.label: Image bias
sub_fields.name: image_bias
sub_fields.instructions: Favor an area of the image when the image is cropped on window resize. Useful when the subject is not centered.

sub_fields.label: Text color
sub_fields.name: text_color
sub_fields.instructions: Adjust for contrast.

choices.false: Normal: max-width of normal page column

sub_fields.label: Headline
sub_fields.name: headline
sub_fields.instructions: Large block headline. Shows underneath block title.

sub_fields.label: Lede
sub_fields.name: lede
sub_fields.instructions: Shows underneath headline. Some blocks work best with a lede and no title.
